sql.where:
ml_g.grouping_id = 4
and ml_g.the_year >= to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy') and ml_g.the_year >= to_char(add_months(trunc(sysdate, 'yyyy'), -48), 'yyyy')

mapper.select:
SELECT prime.organization, prime.station_id, prime.station_type_name, prime.organization_name, prime.site_id, prime.station_name, prime.station_type_name, prime.site_type, prime.huc_8, 'https://www.waterqualitydata.us/provider/' || prime.data_source || '/' || prime.organization || '/' || prime.site_id monitoring_location_url, prime.state_name, prime.county_name, TO_CHAR(prime.geom.sdo_point.y,'FM90.0000000') latitude, TO_CHAR(prime.geom.sdo_point.x,'FM990.0000000') longitude, ml_g.data_source_id, ml_g.data_source, ml_g.station_id, ml_g.the_year, ml_g.characteristic_type, ml_g.characteristic_name, ml_g.total_activities, ml_g.total_results, TO_CHAR(ml_g.last_result_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') last_result_date
FROM station_sum prime JOIN ml_grouping ml_g ON prime.data_source_id = ml_g.data_source_id AND prime.station_id = ml_g.station_id
ORDER BY prime.organization, prime.station_id, ml_g.the_year

select prime.data_source, count(distinct prime.data_source||'-'||prime.station_id) station_count from station_sum prime JOIN ml_grouping ml_g ON prime.data_source_id = ml_g.data_source_id AND prime.station_id = ml_g.station_id
group by rollup(prime.data_source)
